This ware is working fine without any issues once you get it working. I had issues, first the black screen, then freezing constantly and then, poor performance - BUT everything can be solved - assuming your issues are related to ATI drivers. 

First make a link (shortcut) to your rage.exe file. 

Then paste this in the shortcut properties in the "Target" field:

 Rage.exe +cvaradd g_fov 10 +com_allowconsole 1 +com_skipIntroVideo 1 +image_usecompression 0 +g_showplayershadow 1 +m_smooth 0 +image_anisotropy 16 +jobs_numThreads 0

Now, if you still get black screen go to game folder, then /base/video/ and delete - rename or move the .bik files.

Now you should be able to play the game, if you get poor performance - download the optimized Rage AMD driver 10.9 from Guru3D.

After this, my game runs at max settings, high cache and anisotropy + 8xAA in full HD without texture popping - or very little (in big areas). HD6670 1gig + 4Gigs or ddr3 on Athlon 2x2.

It's recommended that you run the updater in the game folder for the latest updates.

NOTE, these AMD drivers will not work with Adobe Ae and Pr.
